sql-case.value: CREATE USER 'user_dev_new'@'localhost' default role role1

CREATE USER user_dev_new PASSWORD 'passwd_dev'
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER user1, user2 DEFAULT ROLE role1

CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY RANDOM password DEFAULT ROLE role1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 1
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY DEFAULT
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 ACCOUNT LOCK
CREATE USER user_unlock DEFAULT ROLE role1 ACCOUNT UNLOCK
CREATE USER user_conn_limit WITH MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 10
CREATE USER user_user_conn_limit WITH MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 5

CREATE USER user_x509 REQUIRE X509
CREATE USER user_tls REQUIRE SUBJECT 'subj' ISSUER 'issuer' CIPHER 'cipher_name'

CREATE USER user_reuse PASSWORD REUSE INTERVAL 10 DAY
CREATE USER user_require_optional PASSWORD REQUIRE CURRENT OPTIONAL

CREATE USER user_plugin_rand IDENTIFIED WITH 'ldap' BY RANDOM PASSWORD
CREATE USER user1 DEFAULT ROLE role1 WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY DEFAULT ACCOUNT LOCK
CREATE USER user_expire_interval DEFAULT ROLE role1 ACCOUNT UNLOCK PASSWORD EXPIRE INTERVAL 30 DAY

CREATE USER user_expire_now PASSWORD EXPIRE
CREATE USER user_history PASSWORD HISTORY 5
CREATE USER user_reuse PASSWORD REUSE INTERVAL 10 DAY

CREATE USER user_require_yes PASSWORD REQUIRE CURRENT
CREATE USER user_failed_lock PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS 5 PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME 7

CREATE USER user_ssl REQUIRE SSL
CREATE USER user_no_tls REQUIRE NONE
CREATE USER user_x509 REQUIRE X509
CREATE USER user_tls REQUIRE SUBJECT 'subj' ISSUER 'issuer' CIPHER 'cipher_name'

CREATE USER user_user_conn WITH MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 5

CREATE USER user1 IDENTIFIED GLOBALLY

CREATE USER user1
CREATE USER user1 WITH ENCRYPTED PASSWORD 'password'
CREATE USER user1 WITH SUPERUSER
CREATE USER user1 WITH CREATEDB CREATEROLE
CREATE USER user1 FROM LOGIN login1
CREATE USER user1 WITH DEFAULT_SCHEMA = schema
CREATE USER user1 WITHOUT LOGIN
CREATE USER user1 FROM CERTIFICATE certificate
CREATE USER user1 FROM ASYMMETRIC KEY asym_key
CREATE USER user1 WITH SYSID 10000
CREATE USER user1 IN GROUP group1,group2
CREATE USER user1 WITH PASSWORD='RN92piTCh%$!~3K9844 Bl*', DEFAULT_LANGUAGE=[Brazilian], DEFAULT_SCHEMA=[dbo]
CREATE USER [Contoso\Fritz]
CREATE USER user1 WITH PASSWORD = 'a8ea v*(Rd##+', SID = 0x01050000000000090300000063FF0451A9E7664BA705B10E37DDC4B7
CREATE USER [User1] WITH DEFAULT_SCHEMA = dbo, ALLOW_ENCRYPTED_VALUE_MODIFICATIONS = ON
CREATE USER [bob@contoso.com] FROM LOGIN [bob@contoso.com]
CREATE USER [AAD group] FROM LOGIN [AAD group]
CREATE USER [bob@contoso.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER
CREATE USER 'jon'@'localhost' COMMENT 'Some information about Jon'
CREATE USER 'mateo'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password' AND IDENTIFIED WITH authentication_ldap_simple AND IDENTIFIED WITH authentication_fido
